ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Does anyone know?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Kunark. Go to OverThere, where you can fear kite, then skeletons in the Dreadlands temple just past 30th level. -- Words of the Sentient: Mahomet made the
ygData.messageBody:
--- Laurie <laurienymphet@...> wrote:
>
> If there is a good spot were the words for our lvl 24 research
> spells drop?.I got all the words and got my 24 pet(thank god)Now Im
> in serch of Sent.(Benza)for the Intensify Death(pet buff)spell.
> And for the life of me I cant find it anywere.On mobs or on venders
> from other players selling it.Any hint would be welcomed.

Kunark. Go to OverThere, where you can fear kite, then skeletons in the
Dreadlands temple just past 30th level.

--
Words of the Sentient:

Mahomet made the people believe that he would call a hill to him, and
from the top of it offer up his prayers for the observers of his law.
The people assembled. Mahomet called the hill to come to him, again and
again; and when the hill stood still he was never a whit abashed, but
said, "If the hill will not come to Mahomet, Mahomet will go to the hill.
-- Francis Bacon

=====
The government that seems the most unwise,
Most goodness to the people supplies;
That which is tampers, touching everything,
Will work but ill, and disappointment bring.
-- Tao Te Ching
